nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice melting into a puddle of water with arrows indicating melting and refreezing
Raw egg transforming into a solid cooked egg without backward arrows
Shows understanding of reversible change (ice melting and refreezing)
Incomplete understanding of irreversible change (egg cooking)
Improve by indicating inability to revert cooked egg to raw state
